info.title: Reward Loyalty API
info.description: API for the Reward Loyalty script.

post.description: This endpoint allows a new member to register an account.

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: The password of the member, if empty a password is generated

parameters.name: time_zone
parameters.description: The time zone of the member

parameters.name: accepts_emails
parameters.description: Whether the member accepts marketing emails from a partner or not

parameters.name: send_mail
parameters.description: Whether to send an email with the password to the newly created member

post.description: This endpoint allows a member to log in by providing their email and password.
This endpoint revokes all access tokens for the authenticated member.

get.description: This endpoint retrieves the data of the authenticated member.

get.summary: Fetches all cards followed and transacted by a member
get.description: Endpoint for retrieving all cards that the authenticated member follows and has transacted with

200.description: Successful operation, returns the array of followed and transacted cards

401.description: Unauthorized access, invalid or missing member token

get.summary: Fetches all cards followed by a member
get.description: Endpoint for retrieving all active cards tracked by the authenticated member

200.description: Successful operation, returns the array of followed cards

401.description: Unauthorized access, invalid or missing member token

get.summary: Fetches all cards member has transacted with
get.description: Endpoint for retrieving all active cards that the authenticated member has interacted with transaction-wise

200.description: Successful operation, returns the array of cards with member's transactions

401.description: Unauthorized access, invalid or missing member token

get.summary: Get the member's balance for a specific card
get.description: Endpoint for retrieving the balance of the authenticated member for a specific card

200.description: Successful operation, returns the member's balance for the specific card

401.description: Unauthorized access, invalid or missing member token

post.description: This endpoint allows a partner to log in by providing their email and password.
This endpoint revokes all access tokens for the authenticated partner.

get.description: This endpoint retrieves the data of the authenticated partner.

get.summary: Fetch all active cards associated with a partner
get.description: Endpoint to retrieve all active cards linked to the authenticated partner, where the associated club is also active

get.summary: Fetch an active card using its ID
get.description: Endpoint for a partner to retrieve a specific active card that they own by its ID

parameters.name: cardId
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the card to be retrieved

get.summary: Retrieve all active clubs associated with the partner
get.description: Endpoint to fetch all clubs linked to the authenticated partner

get.summary: Retrieve details of an active club by its ID
get.description: Endpoint to retrieve club details using clubId for an authenticated partner

get.summary: Retrieve all staff members associated with the partner
get.description: Endpoint to fetch all active staff members linked to the authenticated partner, where the associated club is also active

get.summary: Retrieve details of a staff member by its ID
get.description: Endpoint to retrieve active staff member details using staffId for an authenticated partner, where the associated club is also active

post.summary: Add a new purchase to a card
post.description: Endpoint for a partner to add a new purchase to a card that they own

parameters.name: cardUID
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the card to which the transaction will be added

purchase_amount.description: The amount of money spent on the purchase

image.description: The image associated with the transaction

note.description: An optional note for the purchase

post.summary: Add new points to a card
post.description: Endpoint for a partner to add new points to a card that they own

parameters.name: cardUID
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the card to which the transaction will be added

points.description: The number of points to add

image.description: The image associated with the transaction

note.description: An optional note for the points addition
